text: int main ( ) { int t , i , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , n , j , k , sum , x , y ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= j ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ j ] [ k ] ) ; } } sum = a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; x = 0 ; y = 0 ; for ( j = 1 ; j < n - 1 ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ x + 2 ] [ y ] > a [ x + 2 ] [ y + 2 ] ) { sum = sum + a [ x + 1 ] [ y ] ; x = x + 1 ; y = y ; } else if ( a [ x + 2 ] [ y ] < a [ x + 2 ] [ y + 2 ] ) { sum = sum + a [ x + 1 ] [ y + 1 ] ; x = x + 1 ; y = y + 1 ; } } if ( a [ x + 1 ] [ y ] > a [ x + 1 ] [ y + 1 ] ) sum = sum + a [ x + 1 ] [ y ] ; else if ( a [ x + 1 ] [ y ] < a [ x + 1 ] [ y + 1 ] ) sum = sum + a [ x + 1 ] [ y + 1 ] ; printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
